text: Nocardiopsis baichengensis is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from hypersaline soil in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis baichengensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Nocardiopsis baichengensis
